column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Kya says : " I told you those rocks were slippery .
#Text=" Kya says : " Oh , grow up !
#Text=You have n't changed one bit since we were kids .
#Text=You 're still trying to prove you can do everything a bender can .
#Text=Well , you ca n't .
#Text=Deal with it .
#Text=" Bumi says : " And you 're not our mother .
#Text=You do n't get to tell me what I can and ca n't do .
#Text=Deal with that .
#Text=Ugh .
#Text=" Kya says : " Good luck healing yourself with your special nonbending powers .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Hey , hey , back me up here , Tenzin .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Kya 's right .
#Text=You 're the oldest of us , but you always acted like the youngest .
#Text=I had to become the responsible one .
#Text=" Kya says : " You think you 're the responsible one ?
#Text=Where were you after Dad died and Mom was all alone ?
#Text=Because I was the only one who packed up and moved my whole life to be with her .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Sure , after years of flitting around the world , trying to find yourself .
#Text=It was time for you to settle down somewhere .
#Text=You two have no idea how it feels to have the future of an entire culture on your shoulders .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Oh , boo - hoo .
#Text=Must 've been real hard for you , flying around the world with Dad , riding elephant koi all day .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Oh , so that 's what this is all about .
#Text=" Kya says : " That 's what it 's always been about .
#Text=You think you 're some savior who has to carry on Dad 's legacy .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Who else is going to do it ?
#Text=" Kya says : " How about all of us ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Yeah , we 're Aang 's kids too .
#Text=" Kya says : " We never should have come on this vacation .
#Text=" Bumi says : " I could n't agree more .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Well , I did n't want you to come in the first place .
#Text=I ca n't be around you two right now .
#Text=Go back to the temple and see if Ikki returned .
#Text=I 'll keep looking out here .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Fine .
#Text=" Kya says : " Fine .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Fine .
#Text=" Korra says : " Is it okay if I come in ?
#Text=" Senna says : " Of course .
#Text=We heard what happened .
#Text=Are you okay ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm so glad you were n't there .
#Text=I do n't know what I would 've done .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I had no idea how far Varrick was willing to go .
#Text=My brother and I have our differences , but I would never attack him .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry for thinking you had anything to do with the rebels .
#Text=And for all the pain I 've caused you and Mom .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I 'm the one who should apologize .
#Text=After I saw the Southern Lights return , I was so proud of you .
#Text=I never should 've held you back .
#Text=" Senna says : " When your father and I found each other , all we wanted was to live a simple life and raise a family .
#Text=But , then we discovered you were the Avatar , and simple was over .
#Text=We knew one day the world would need you , and you would n't need us anymore .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mom , Dad , of course I still need you .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " We were n't expecting you .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Tonraq , Senna , you are under arrest and will stand trial .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Trial ?
#Text=For what ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " For conspiring to assassinate me .
#Text="
